overview: Mr. James B. DeBello was named President and Chief Executive Officer in May 2003. He has served as a director of Mitek since 1994. Since joining Mitek Systems as CEO, Mr. DeBello has transformed the Company into a leading developer of smartphone applications that leverage the capabilities of the cell phone camera and address high growth markets. Prior to being named Chief Executive Officer, he served as Chief Executive Officer of AsiaCorp Communications from 2001 to May 2003. Prior to that, he served as Venture CEO of IdeaEdge Ventures from 2000 to 2001. Prior to that, he served as President and Chief Operating Officer of CollegeClub.com from 1999 to 2000, Chief Operating Officer of Wireless Knowledge in 1998, a joint venture between Qualcomm and Microsoft, and Vice President and General Manager of Qualcomm’s Eudora Internet Division from 1996 to 1998.

relationships.title: Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer
